alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 6:51AM PST until January 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to around 40 mph. * WHERE...Death Valley National Park and the Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Western Mojave Desert
